Exception Summary
ApplicationAlreadyRegistredException When an aplication is registered more than once.
 

Package org.middleheaven.application Description

Application definition classes. Applications are defined by a ApplicationModel witch contains at least one Module. It may contain as many modules as needed. ApplicationModules are loaded by the ApplicationService
